TextBlock.Text: SOLANUM: We've finally found the <color=lightblue>Eye of the universe</color>. I wish my clan could see this.

SOLANUM: Still, strangers from another star system had important knowledge. They had technology that could understand the <color=lightblue>Eye</color> better. I have a hypothesis that the <color=lightblue>Eye</color> is dangerous, based on their vision. However, their interpretation could be wrong.
SOLANUM: What do we do with this knowledge about the <color=lightblue>Eye</color>? I want to learn about it, and I want to find it - but I'm not sure how to reach it.
SOLANUM: Am I wrong? Is that Memory Statue active? In this activated state, it should be transmitting data to the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color>.. I'll take a look at it.
